* Stefan Tilkov <stefan.tilkov@...> [2008-07-07 14:10]:
> On Jul 3, 2008, at 5:20 PM, Aristotle Pagaltzis wrote:
> > Arguably, a 201 response with a Location header and an empty
> > entity body should be treated like a 303 status.
> 
> Thanks. I emphatically agree this would be the *best* behavior,
> I'm just not able to find something in the spec that mandates
> this.

There isn’t any mandate. Sadly so, as far as I’m concerned…

Regards,
-- 
Aristotle Pagaltzis // <http://plasmasturm.org/>
